summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Jesus Christ Superstar 2012 Live Arena Tour Review Date: 2014/02/13 Store: Tim Minchin (Actor), Melanie C (Actor), Laurence Connor (Director), Nick Morris (Director) & 1 more Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Musicals & Performing Arts, Musicals Product Description: ['Tim Rice and Andrew Lloyd Webber\'s rock classic Jesus Christ Superstar returns to its roots with this sensational performance filmed in the UK during the Live Arena Tour. An incredible cast including Tim Minchin as Judas Iscariot, Melanie C as Mary Magdalene, Chris Moyles as King Herod and Ben Forster as Jesus Christ, perform hit songs including "I Don\'t Know How to Love Him," "Gethsemane," "Heaven on Their Minds," "Everything\'s Alright," "King Herod\'s Song" and "Superstar" in an exciting and contemporary interpretation.', 'Bonus Content:', 'An Introduction by Andrew Lloyd Webber', 'An Introduction by Andrew Lloyd Webber', 'Behind the Scenes', 'Behind the Scenes', ']]>'] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Musicals, Arts, Culture & Entertainment, Arthouse', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Dione Orrom, Tim Minchin, Nick Morris, Giovanni Spano, Gerard Bentall, Melanie C, Pete Gallagher, Ben Forster, Alex Hanson, Chris Moyles, Brett Sullivan, Michael Pickering, Laurence ConnorDione Orrom, Tim Minchin, Nick Morris, Giovanni Spano, Gerard Bentall, Melanie C, Pete Gallagher, Ben Forster, Alex Hanson, Chris Moyles, Brett Sullivan, Michael Pickering, Laurence Connor See more', 'Initial release date': '2013-09-10', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '27492430', 'Director': 'Laurence Connor, Nick Morris', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 45 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 10, 2013', 'Actors': 'Tim Minchin, Melanie C, Chris Moyles, Ben Forster, Alex Hanson', 'Subtitles': 'Korean, French, Spanish, Japanese, Thai, Mandarin Chinese', 'Producers': 'Dione Orrom, Brett Sullivan', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: I'm a child of the 70s so I fell in love with JCS a long time ago. But this one, really was the best version I've ever seen,.....it is just so powerful and so well done. My favorite is Tim Minchin, whom I didn't even know existed until I say this version of JCS, after wards I just had to google him and see what he was all about. And I'm so glad I did!!!! Wow! Ben was awesome as Jesus too, but Tim definitely stole the show. definitely well worth the money and the time to watch it. Review Title: Absolutely Incredible!!!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/05/01 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Morten Tyldum'], 'Producers': ['Nora Grossman', 'Ido Ostrowsky', 'Teddy Schwarzman', 'Peter Heslop'], 'Starring': ['Benedict Cumberbatch', 'Keira Knightley', 'Matthew Goode'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']} Review Text: I enjoyed the Imitation Game,......it reminds me a lot of the movie A Beautiful Mind,....and it has it's very funny moments and it's very sad ones. I didn't like however how they took many years of time after the war and made it seem like it was almost no time at all. you'll understand after you watch it, if you google his name and read how his life actually went. But, other than the too quick ending, it's a great movie and you will laugh a lot. Review Title: Great Movie, but.... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/09/09 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Kenneth Fink', 'J. Miller Tobin', 'Bobby Roth', 'Matt Earl Beesley', 'John Terlesky', 'Sanford Bookstaver', 'Colin Bucksey', 'Matt Shakman', 'John Scott', 'Randy Zisk'], 'Starring': ['Madeleine Stowe', 'Emily VanCamp', 'Gabriel Mann'], 'Studio': ['ABC']} Review Text: This is a great recap of the whole first season, narrated by the awesome Nolan Ross himself, if you love him like most of us do you will love this!
Gabriel Mann is just so so good in this series. Hope so much to see a Spin-off with him as the star! Review Title: Narrated by Nolan Ross!!!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bull Review Date: 2020/04/16 Categories: Comedy, Drama Product Description: ['Season four of BULL returns a few months after the bombshell revelation that Dr. Jason Bull (Michael Weatherly) is expecting a child with his ex-wife and Benny’s (Freddy Rodriguez) sister, Isabella Colón (Yara Martinez).'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Starring': ['Michael Weatherly', 'Freddy Rodríguez', 'Geneva Carr']} Review Text: I missed Anthony Dinozzo in NCIS,....but this is a good place for him, he does a great job as Bull. I look forward to every episode. The rest of the actors are awesome too,....all around a great series. Review Title: Great series! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/06/11 Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Zander Weaver'], 'Producers': ['Elliot Weaver', 'Zander Weaver'], 'Starring': ['Tom England', 'Joshua Ford']} Review Text: I loved it. It was not full of special effects or eye candy, just good conversations and very exciting experiences. Wow.
Excellent movie. Review Title: Great Movie Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual's purchase history indicates a strong preference for emotionally engaging movies and performances, particularly musicals and biographical dramas. They consistently express high satisfaction with high-quality productions, reflected in their repeated ratings near 4.6-5.0 across various genres, notably in musicals, drama, and comedy. The person's affinity for powerful storytelling and character-driven narratives is evident, as they appreciate strong performances by notable actors.

Common themes include a penchant for well-executed renditions of classic stories and character development, suggesting a nostalgic connection to certain genres and themes. Price sensitivity is not explicitly mentioned, but their consistent acquisition of higher-quality productions indicates a willingness to invest in meaningful content rather than low-budget alternatives.

Furthermore, the individual enjoys a balance of light-hearted moments alongside deeper, often poignant narratives, showcasing a liking for humor integrated with seriousness. They also demonstrate awareness of production elements, valuing components like direction, script, and performance quality. Overall, their core preferences align with refined tastes in dramatic arts, prioritizing impactful storytelling and profound characters over superficial visuals or entertainment.

target_interaction.title: Great!
target_interaction.text: We watched NCIS first and finished the story on Hawaii! I love mixing the teams. Do it more often.
